nodes.bodyText:
I am not sure if this works. It might potentially fail the license header check.

I think it works, but it seems mvn license:format is not a right command to generate license for project, do you know what's the right one?
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -6,9 +6,9 @@ * to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the * "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance * with the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at - * - * http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 - * + *

nodes.bodyText:
mvn license:format is the right command to format the license. Otherwise you will fail the CI. checkstyle is enabled on pulsar-client-api module. You can find there is no

in the license header. https://github.com/apache/pulsar/blob/master/pulsar-client-api/src/main/java/org/apache/pulsar/client/api/Authentication.java#L10
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -6,9 +6,9 @@ * to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the * "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance * with the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at - * - * http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 - * + *
